Package part1

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMailStore
    Interface containing the definition of the basic functions of a MailStore
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLI
    This class implements a CLI program to use the Mail Service
    Filtrate
    Contains predefined filters
    Filtrate.ContainsPredicate
    Class implementing the predicate to filtrate messages containing the given word, either in the subject or the body.
    Filtrate.ContainsSubject
    Class implementing the predicate to filtrate messages containing the given word, at least in the subject.
    Filtrate.LessThanPredicate
    Class implementing the predicate to filtrate messages with less than the given words in the body.
    Filtrate.SenderIs
    Class implementing the predicate to filtrate messages whose sender has the given username
    InMemoryMailStore
    Class implementing a in memory Mail Store
    MailBox
    Class implementing a mail box
    MailSystem
    Class with the Mail System functions
    Message
    Class implementing a message or mail
    OnFileMailStore
    Class implementing a File mail store
    Sort
    Class implementing some predefined comparators
    Sort.SortNewFirst
    Comparator to sort by new
    Sort.SortOldFirst
    Comparator to sort by old
    Sort.SortSenderAsc
    Comparator to sort alphabetically by sender
    Sort.SortSenderDesc
    Comparator to sort alphabetically reversed by sender
    Sort.SortSubjectAsc
    Comparator to sort alphabetically by subject
    Sort.SortSubjectDesc
    Comparator to sort alphabetically reversed by subject
    Sort.SortWordsAsc
    Comparator to sort by increasing message body word count
    Sort.SortWordsDesc
    Comparator to sort by descending message body word count
    Test  
    User
    Class implementing the user functionalities
